subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: After a shabby first half, Tigers star quarterback Deshaun Watson went on to rush for a career-high 107 yards and a touchdown, leading Clemson to clinch the Atlantic Coast Conference Atlantic Division.
snippet: After a shabby first half, Tigers star quarterback Deshaun Watson went on to rush for a career-high 107 yards and a touchdown, leading Clemson to clinch the Atlantic Coast Conference Atlantic Division.
